titles.title: A bill to amend section 1807(a)(7) of Pub. L. 99-514.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/8/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to establish a special rule to govern the taxation of certain amounts treated as part of a designated settlement fund with respect to a corporation that filed for bankruptcy reorganization on November 1, 1982.
